matches.lesson_id: Initiating and Managing GIS Work Orders
matches.reason: Exact demo of opening Helix app, creating folder, downloading ES final, GIS pole size edit via new alternative, take ownership, change state to Proposed.
Street View verification (dated 2019), pole conditions, clearances, tree trimming assessment (18" secondary), spans, access (off-road Walmart).

matches.lesson_id: Reviewing Make-Ready Sheets and Field Documentation
matches.reason: ES Final Excel review: poles, GIS IDs, clearances (e.g., 40" TPX), work types (Wake Ready, raise secondary), licensee Jason Wino.

matches.lesson_id: Pole Location, Condition, and Attribute Management
matches.reason: GIS pole attributes: ID, status Existing/Replace, height/class, ownership, GPS coords, joint use.

matches.lesson_id: Anchor and Guy Wire Inspection and Editing
matches.reason: Anchor/Guy add-in: edit lead length (9.5 to 10), guy size (13M to 5), ownership, rotate icon; photos verification.

matches.lesson_id: Compatible Units Selection and Cost Estimation
matches.reason: CU list Excel (NGrid_CUsAH-Lite), add CUs manually (TLA-CDLRECXFMR), warnings, labor hours/dollars.

matches.lesson_id: GIS Editing Tools and Object Verification
matches.reason: Verify edits in object relationships (username, changes); Navigator, Object Control, Point/Span Editor.
